Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CIMDSMSTalker::CIMDSMSTalker (  const char *  ip,
uint16  port,
const char *  userName,
const char *  password,
const char *  bindAddress
) 
 

Create a new CIMDSMSTalker.

Parameters:
ip The ip number to connect to.
port The port to connect to.
userName The user name to use when logging in. If empty a default value will be used.
password The password to send to the SMSC when logging in. If empty a default value will be used.
bindAddress Address to bind to or NULL if 0.0.0.0.

virtual CIMDSMSTalker::~CIMDSMSTalker (   )  [virtual]
 

Delete this CIMDSMSTalker.

Clears the event queue.

int CIMDSMSTalker::getNextPacketNbr (   )  [inline, private]
 

Returns:
The packet number for the next message to the SMSC. The number is increased by 2.

CIMDEvent* CIMDSMSTalker::waitForEvent (   )  [private]
 

Waits for an event in the eventQueue and returns it.

Returns:
The next element in eventQueue and NULL if timeout.

bool CIMDSMSTalker::waitForEvent (  CIMDParserResult::result_t  result  )  [private]
 

Compares result to the first result in the eventQueue.

Parameters:
result The result to wait for.
Returns:
True if the result was what we were waiting for. False if the result was something else or there was a timeout.
